string-array.name: welcome_messages
string-array.item: Hello! I need help with a situation I currently have. Will you be able to help me now?
Hi, the application choose you as available to help me at this time. Are you?
Hello there! Thanks for listing yourself as being able to help me!
Hi. I need help. Do you have time to help me?
Hello! I cannot ask anyone else for help currently so maybe you can help me out?
